text: Charles Rodway Clarke (born 21 September 1950) is an English Labour Party politician. He was born in London. Clarke was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Norwich South from 1997 until 2010. He was Home Secretary from December 2004 until May 2006. ==References== ==Other websites== * Guardian Unlimited Politics – Ask Aristotle: Charles Clarke MP * TheyWorkForYou.com – Charles Clarke MP * BBC News – Charles Clarke profile 17 October 2002 Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from London
title: Charles Clarke
